page.title: 14My day at school.
page.content: On Tuesday I come to school and play outside. When the bell rings I go in my classroom and read my book. We read till ten o'clock and then we do our news which is about everything we do at the weekend. Then we do our Maths. For our Maths we weigh things and do ordinary sums. At twelve o'clock we pack up and get ready for dinner. The school dinner people go over to dinner and the sandwich people put their lunch boxes out. Then they play. When the school dinners come out, the sandwich people go in and the school dinner people play. Then the bell goes and we go in to school for our afternoon work. At three-fifteen we go home.
